SQL: SELECT CivilizationType as PageId, null as PageGroupId, "Civilization" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Civilizations where StartingCivilizationLevelType = "CIVILIZATION_LEVEL_FULL_CIV"

SELECT distinct Leaders.LeaderType AS PageId, null AS PageGroupId, "Leader" AS PageLayoutId, Leaders.Name, null AS Tooltip FROM Leaders INNER JOIN CivilizationLeaders on CivilizationLeaders.LeaderType = Leaders.LeaderType INNER JOIN Civilizations ON CivilizationLeaders.CivilizationType = Civilizations.CivilizationType WHERE Civilizations.StartingCivilizationLevelType = "CIVILIZATION_LEVEL_FULL_CIV"

SELECT CivilizationType as PageId, TypeProperties.Value as PageGroupId, "CityState" as PageLayoutId, Civilizations.Name as Name, null as Tooltip FROM Civilizations inner join TypeProperties on Civilizations.CivilizationType = TypeProperties.Type where StartingCivilizationLevelType = "CIVILIZATION_LEVEL_CITY_STATE" and TypeProperties.Name = "CityStateCategory"
SELECT DistrictType as PageId, null as PageGroupId, "District" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Districts where InternalOnly = 0
SELECT BuildingType as PageId, PreReqDistrict as PageGroupId, "Building" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Buildings Where IsWonder = 0 AND InternalOnly = 0
SELECT BuildingType as PageId, "Wonders" as PageGroupId, "Building" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Buildings Where IsWonder = 1 AND InternalOnly = 0
SELECT ProjectType as PageId, "Projects" as PageGroupId, "Project" as PageLayoutId, ShortName as Name, null as Tooltip FROM Projects
SELECT UnitPromotionType as PageId, PromotionClass as PageGroupId, "UnitPromotion" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM UnitPromotions
SELECT GreatPersonIndividualType as PageId, GreatPersonClassType as PageGroupId, "GreatPerson" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM GreatPersonIndividuals
SELECT TechnologyType as PageId, EraType as PageGroupId, "Technology" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Technologies
SELECT CivicType as PageId, EraType as PageGroupId, "Civic" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Civics
SELECT GovernmentType as PageId, "Government" as PageGroupId, "Government" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Governments
SELECT PolicyType as PageId, GovernmentSlotType as PageGroupId, "Policy" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Policies
SELECT ReligionType as PageId, "Religion" as PageGroupId, "Religion" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Religions WHERE Pantheon = 0 and RequiresCustomName = 0
SELECT BeliefType as PageId, BeliefClassType as PageGroupId, "Belief" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Beliefs
SELECT TerrainType as PageId, "Terrain" as PageGroupId, "Terrain" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Terrains where Mountain = 0 and TerrainType <> "TERRAIN_OUTOFPLAY"
SELECT FeatureType as PageId, CASE WHEN NaturalWonder=0 THEN "Feature" ELSE "Wonder" END as PageGroupId, "Feature" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Features
SELECT ResourceType as PageId, ResourceClassType as PageGroupId, "Resource" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Resources
SELECT ImprovementType as PageId, "Improvements" as PageGroupId, "Improvement" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Improvements Where BarbarianCamp = 0 and Goody = 0
SELECT RouteType as PageId, "Routes" as PageGroupId, "Route" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Routes

SELECT UnitType as PageId, FormationClass as PageGroupId, "Unit" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Units u WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT UnitType From HeroClasses where UnitType = u.UnitType) AND TraitType is null or TraitType <> "TRAIT_BARBARIAN"

SELECT Units.UnitType as PageId, "Heroes" as PageGroupId, "HeroUnit" as PageLayoutId, Units.Name, HeroClasses.HeroClassType as HeroClass, null as Tooltip FROM Units INNER JOIN HeroClasses ON Units.UnitType=HeroClasses.UnitType WHERE Units.TraitType is null or Units.TraitType <> "TRAIT_BARBARIAN"
